translation.sentence: **ERROR** An error occurred while executing command.
**ERROR** You are not authorized to use the command.
**ERROR** This command can be executed only in the chat group.

**HELP** Hi {name}, welcome to the Telegram Payment Bot. Here is the list of supported commands.
**Generic** /help : show this message /alive : show if bot is active /set_test_mode true/false : enable/disable test mode /is_test_mode : show if test mode is enabled /auth_users : show the list of users authorized to use the bot /chat_info : show the chat information - **Only group** /users_list : show the list of all users in group - **Only group** /invite_link : generate a new invite link - **Only group**
**Username** /check_no_username [HOURS_LEFT] : show users with no username - **Only group** /remove_no_username : remove users with no username - **Only group**
**Payments** /set_check_payment_on_join true/false : enable/disable payment check when a new member joins /is_check_payment_on_join : show if payment check when a new member joins is enabled /check_payments_data : show if payments data contains some errors /email_no_payment [DAYS_LEFT]: send a reminder email to users whose payments is about to expire /check_no_payment [DAYS_LEFT] [LAST_DAY]: show users whose payments is about to expire - **Only group** /remove_no_payment : remove users whose payment is expired - **Only group**
Commands that can be executed only in chat group are specified in bold text. Parameters in square brakets are optional.
**NOTE:** it's possible to add "quiet" o "q" as last parameter to get the result in a private chat, to avoid flooding the chat group
